text: Prof. Maithri Wickremesinghe, Ministers Lakshman Kiriella, Gayantha Karunathilake, and Former Minster Ravi Karunanayake were also present on this occasion.Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe participated in religious observances and an alms giving held at the Sri Dalada Maligawa on 13th August, to commemorate his 40 years in Parliament. Prof. Maithri Wickremesinghe, Ministers Lakshman Kiriella, Gayantha Karunathilake, and Former Minster Ravi Karunanayake were also present on this occasion.
title: PM worships Dalada Maligawa
